sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
{{show_overlay}}
<v-overlay persistent class="d-flex align-center" v-model="show_overlay">
    <v-card style="min-width: 600px; min-height: 600px">
        <v-carousel style="min-width: 600px; min-height: 600px">
            <v-carousel-item v-for="(text, index) in ('Geef nooit zomaar je gegevens op het internet :), want we hebben nu al jouw ip ' + ip).split(' ')" :key="index">
                {{text}}
            </v-carousel-item>
            
        </v-carousel>
    </v-card>
</v-overlay>
</template>
 
<script>
export default {
 name: '',
 components: {
 
 },
 props: {
 
 },
 emits: [],
 setup() {
 
 },
 data(){
    return {
        ip: '',
        show_overlay: true
    }
 },
 computed: {
 
 },
 methods: {
    async getIp(){
    return fetch('https://api.ipify.org?format=json')
        .then(x => x.json())
        .then(({ ip }) => {
            this.term = ip;
            return ip
        });
    
    }
 },
 watch: {
 
 },
 created() {
    this.ip = this.getIp()
 },
 mounted() {
 
 },
 
 
}
</script>
 
<style scoped>
 
</style>
>
